mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.user_name AS "userName", a.password AS "password", a.user_email AS "userEmail", a.user_phone AS "userPhone", a.user_wechat AS "userWechat", a.user_qq AS "userQq", a.user_type AS "userType", a.login_ip AS "loginIp", a.login_date AS "loginDate", a.login_flag AS "loginFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cus_user a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.login_name like CONCAT('%', #{loginName}, '%')
AND a.user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cus_user( id, login_name, user_name, password, user_email, user_phone, user_wechat, user_qq, user_type, login_ip, login_date, login_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{loginName}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userWechat}, #{userQq}, #{userType}, #{loginIp}, #{loginDate}, #{loginFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cus_user SET login_name = #{loginName}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_wechat = #{userWechat}, user_qq = #{userQq}, user_type = #{userType}, login_ip = #{loginIp}, login_date = #{loginDate}, login_flag = #{loginFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
